title: Norton Ghost v14.0.0.24815
description:
Technical information
Norton Ghost v14.0.0.24815 (2008)
English | Series Incl | 89MB

Norton Ghost, one of the utilities of more famous and recognized backup, allows you to keep absolutely everything what your PC contains. From the operating system, up to photos, documents, music, videos.
This program realizes constant copies of safety (incremental, to save time and I spread) and exports them to different means: to another hard disk of your PC, external hard disks (USB), devices Iomega Zip and Jaz, CD and DVD, etc.
Norton Ghost is your savior in case of disaster, it will recover everything as it was, even when your operating system does not start{does not pull out}.
